skinInTheGame.title: Skin-in-the-Game

stakeholderControl.title: Stakeholder Control
stakeholderControl.description: Every ticket holder has a voice in the network's future

sovereignty.title: True Coinholder Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Unlike traditional cryptocurrencies where changes are decided by a small group of developers or miners, Decred gives the power directly to coinholders. Through time-locked tickets, stakeholders vote on-chain to approve consensus rule changes, treasury spending, and network policies. Every vote is recorded on the blockchain and automatically executed—no politics, no compromises, just pure stakeholder governance.

security.title: <gradient>Dual-Layer</gradient> Security
security.subtitle: Decred's hybrid consensus combines Proof-of-Work and Proof-of-Stake to create a security model that's significantly more resilient than pure PoW chains.

pow.title: Proof-of-Work
pow.description: Miners compete to propose new blocks using computational power.
pow.label: Block Creation

pos.title: Proof-of-Stake
pos.description: Stakeholders vote to validate blocks before finalization.
pos.label: Block Validation

finalizedBlock.title: Finalized Block
finalizedBlock.description: Only blocks approved by both miners AND stakeholders become part of the chain.

items.minerControl: Miners have unchecked control over blocks

security.result: <emphasis>Result:</emphasis> To attack Decred, an adversary would need to acquire majority hashpower <italic>and</italic> majority stake simultaneously—making attacks economically impractical.

noTrustedSetup.title: No trusted setup
noTrustedSetup.description: StakeShuffle requires no trusted setup or third-party coordinators. Fully decentralized privacy.

auditable.title: Supply remains auditable
auditable.description: Total supply stays fully transparent and verifiable on the blockchain. Privacy without hidden inflation.

prunable.title: Blockchain can be pruned
prunable.description: Efficient design allows nodes to prune old data while maintaining security and verification capabilities.

treasury.title: <gradient>Self-Funding</gradient> Treasury
treasury.subtitle: 10% of every block reward flows directly to the treasury—no foundations, no VCs, just stakeholder-controlled sustainable development.
